title: Vehicle of Interest in ADW (Gun), 3900 b/o S Capitol St, SW, on August 22, 2021
author: OfficialDCPolice
description:
The Metropolitan Police Department seeks the public's assistance in identifying a vehicle of interest in reference to an Assault with a Dangerous Weapon (Gun) incident which occurred in the 3900 block of South Capitol Street, SW, on Sunday, August 22, 2021, at approximately 7:20 PM. The vehicle was captured by nearby surveillance cameras.

DO YOUR PART TO HELP PREVENT AND SOLVE CRIME. The Metropolitan Police Department currently offers a reward of up to $10,000 to anyone who provides information that leads to the arrest and conviction of the person or persons responsible for a violent crime committed in the District of Columbia. CCN #21-118-918

Anyone who can identify this vehicle or who has knowledge of this incident should take no action but call police at (202) 727-9099 or text your tip to the Department's TEXT TIP LINE to 50411.
